comments.author: asaf.zamir@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

I think it would be a very wise thing to take a look at
http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/#auto-toc-9

I would really like to see an audio capturing option being added to chrome,
at such a level that would let you stream the audio from within a browser.


I recently saw the there is some sort of development in the audio capturing region
http://www.engadget.com/2011/03/23/chrome-11-goes-beta-with-speech-to-text-capabilities/

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: asaf.zamir@gmail.com
